patterns: How do I file a grievance?
I want to make a complaint
What's the process for submitting a grievance?
responses: To file a grievance, please visit our online portal and fill out the grievance form. Alternatively, you can call our helpline at 1-800-123-4567.

patterns: What's the status of my grievance?
How can I check my complaint status?
responses: To check the status of your grievance, please log in to our online portal and go to the 'My Grievances' section. You'll find real-time updates there.

patterns: How long does it take to resolve a grievance?
When will my complaint be addressed?
responses: The time to resolve a grievance varies depending on its complexity. Typically, we aim to resolve grievances within 14 business days.
